text: Anton Yuryevich Smirnov (; born 7 August 1983) is a former Russian professional football player. ==Club career== He played two seasons in the Russian Football National League for FC Mashuk-KMV Pyatigorsk, FC Spartak-MZhK Ryazan and FC Zvezda Irkutsk. ==External links== * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC SKVICH Minsk players Category:FC Zvezda Irkutsk players Category:FC Sheksna Cherepovets players Category:FC Slavia Mozyr players Category:Belarusian Premier League players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus
title: Anton Smirnov (footballer)
